reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN Super Slim Dimmer Light Switch, Quiet Rocker, Max 300W LED, CFL, 600W Incandescent, Single Pole or 3 Way Dimmable Switch with Screwless Wallplate, ETL Listed, 3 Pack, White
reviews.text: The BESTTEN Super Slim Dimmer Light Switch exceeded my expectations! Installation was incredibly straightforward, even in my older home where space in the electrical boxes is limited. The ultra-slim profile fits perfectly and looks sleek on the wall. I love the quiet rocker feature—dimming is silent and smooth, making it ideal for bedrooms and living areas. This dimmer handles everything I throw at it, from LED and CFL bulbs to incandescent lights, with seamless performance. The added bonus of not needing a neutral wire simplified the setup significantly. Overall, it's a fantastic upgrade that brings both style and functionality to my home!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2024
reviews.title: Sleek Design and Smooth Operation!

reviews.text: I have been searching for years for a dimmer that was thin enough to fit in my electrical box from 1964. Normal dimmers were too "deep" to fit, and I could never get them to sit flush with the wall so I could get the switch cover back on. I came across this product by chance, and boy am I glad I did! It's fits perfect, and now I don't have a big ol' switch hanging exposed out of the wall! Success At Last!

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN Super Slim Dimmer Light Switch, Quiet Rocker, Max 300W LED, CFL, 600W Incandescent, Single Pole or 3 Way Dimmable Switch with Screwless Wallplate, ETL Listed, 3 Pack, White
reviews.text: This must be one of the slimmest dimmer switches I have seen in recent memory, extending only 22mm into the box and leaving plenty of room for wire nuts or lever nuts. Installation is like any other 3-way switch; just hook up line, neutral and load wires and put it all back in the box. However, I was a bit dismayed to find that the traveler wire was pre-stripped and NOT capped out of the box. If you're a beginner and you don't realize this, then you're asking for a huge problem as 120V AC comes off this spare wire while the switch is in the OFF position (when you might think it is safe)! While capping this line is noted in the docs, this can present a huge problem for the novice who doesn't realize this and repacks the switch into a metal box with impunity. Beyond that, though, I tested the unit with several LED bulbs and panels, and each dimmed as advertised, and the adjustment wheel can help to fine-tune the light output, too.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.title: Nice click, an easy slide dimmer, and a slim profile to boot, but DANGEROUS for the beginner.

Happy with the outcome.

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN Super Slim Dimmer Light Switch, Quiet Rocker, Max 300W LED, CFL, 600W Incandescent, Single Pole or 3 Way Dimmable Switch with Screwless Wallplate, ETL Listed, 3 Pack, White
reviews.text: It's a rocking switch that has audible click when it's turned ON or OFF, it isn't quiet. The worse of it is that it doesn't work well with LED lights, it doesn't keep them from flickering the only way to stop that nuisance is to move the dimmer slider all the way to maximum; so, it works like a regular rocking light switch, not like a dimmer.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.title: Performance

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN Super Slim Dimmer Light Switch, Quiet Rocker, Max 300W LED, CFL, 600W Incandescent, Single Pole or 3 Way Dimmable Switch with Screwless Wallplate, ETL Listed, 3 Pack, White
reviews.text: Ordered these BESTTEN 3 Pack Super Slim Digital Dimmer Light Switch, Quiet Rocker as I am a journeyman electrician and like to test out the products I see come through Vine. Sometimes a bit of a risk as I'd say only 50% of them I am able to actually use on jobs. These dimmers passed the test. They came packaged in a branded cardboard box with each dimmer in an individual box. They include great instructions, a screwless faceplate and all necessary hardware. The feel of them is considerably lighter and thinner than the gold standard Lutron dimmers, but they are about 1/3 the price. Slimmer and lighter in nature with no LED illumination to let you know if they are on or what the power level is set at. The slider is my favorite style of dimmer as that allows a very intuitive memory setting and you can still use the paddle switch for on and off. The rocker is silent and feels a little bit cheap but works well. Can be wired in single pole or 3 way configurations. I only tested the single pole application using a dimmable fixture. The response was good with no flicker, Not quite as responsive in the low range. It even dimmed a non-dimmable fixture fairly well with no flicker at a few output levels. I teetered between 4 and 5 stars on this product, for the price they are excellent and the packaging/instructions/branding is also excellent. I ended up going with 4 stars because of the build quality with the caveat that for the price they exceed my expectations, while not being the kind of dimmer you would get for spending 3 times as much.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.title: Value dimmers that work

reviews.productTitle: BESTTEN Super Slim Dimmer Light Switch, Quiet Rocker, Max 300W LED, CFL, 600W Incandescent, Single Pole or 3 Way Dimmable Switch with Screwless Wallplate, ETL Listed, 3 Pack, White
